heading: TARGETED MUSCLES: Arms, shoulders, and chest. These push-ups will strengthen your arms, shoulders, and chest. Try this exercise during a TV commercial break.

steps.1: Face a wall, standing a little farther than armâ€™s length away, feet shoulder-width apart.
steps.2: Lean your body forward and put your palms flat against the wall at shoulder height and shoulder-width apart.
steps.3: Slowly breathe in as you bend your elbows and lower your upper body toward the wall in a slow, controlled motion. Keep your feet flat on the floor.
steps.5: Breathe out and slowly push yourself back until your arms are straight.
